issue.title: [Format][C++] Support small bit-width indices in sparse tensor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5736](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5736). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Adding 32bit sparse index support is necessary to support non-copy data sharing with the existing systems such as SciPy.
